医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CHOP 研究表明轮状病毒疫苗在新生儿重症监护病房中的安全性费城儿童医院 (CHOP) 的研究人员发现，在新生儿重症监护病房 (NICU) 中轮状病毒疫苗株的传播很少见，并且不会产生临床后果，这强烈表明，在住院期间给符合条件的婴儿接种轮状病毒疫苗所带来的免疫益处超过任何风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/CHOP-study-shows-safety-of-rotavirus-vaccine-in-neonatal-intense-care-unit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/CHOP-study-shows-safety-of-rotavirus-vaccine-in-neonatal-intense-care-unit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2c6ae0c-6b41-49e3-879d-af70d56ab37a Mon, 09 Dec 2024 11:24:23 -0500 CHOP study shows safety of rotavirus vaccine in neonatal intensive care unit
为卵巢早衰的诊断和治疗制定新指南关于卵巢早衰 (POI) 诊断和治疗的新指南 – 由莫纳什大学女性生殖健康卓越研究中心 (CRE-WHiRL) 和主要国际女性健康组织以及国际专家团队共同制定，其中包括具有生活经验的女性 – 将于今天（待定）在三个领先期刊上同时发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-guidelines-development-for-the-diagnosis-and-management-of-premature-ovarian-insufficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-guidelines-development-for-the-diagnosis-and-management-of-premature-ovarian-insufficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3f33bb9-fc40-4ca5-93b5-399407226f42 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 11:11:02 -0500 New guidelines developed for the diagnosis and management of premature ovarian insufficiency
健康饮食有助于减轻慢性疼痛的严重程度慢性疼痛是一种急性且使人衰弱的疾病，影响着全世界数百万人。尽管可以采取疼痛干预措施，但许多人根本没有治疗就陷入困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Healthy-diet-can-help-reduce-the-severity-of-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Healthy-diet-can-help-reduce-the-severity-of-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08c1a94c-2cce-42d9-b521-8a641f35fe63 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 10:07:33 -0500 Healthy diet can help reduce the severity of chronic pain
简单的膳食补充剂可能提供增强 CAR T 细胞抗癌能力的新方法宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院和宾夕法尼亚大学医学院艾布拉姆森癌症中心的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，一种简单的膳食补充剂可能提供一种增强 CAR T 细胞功能的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Simple-dietary-supplement-may-provide-new-approach-to-boost-CAR-T-cell-cancer-fighting-power.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Simple-dietary-supplement-may-provide-new-approach-to-boost-CAR-T-cell-cancer-fighting-power.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd357955-aed8-464b-b4b2-415d4b7907cd Mon, 09 Dec 2024 09:56:23 -0500 Simple dietary supplement may provide new approach to boost CAR T cell cancer-fighting power
医院获得性压疮可能会阻碍脊髓损伤患者的神经功能恢复由俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心和医学院以及德国柏林夏里特医学大学的科学家领导的研究首次提供了证据，表明医院获得性压疮是急性压力性溃疡患者神经功能恢复不良的一个潜在危险因素。脊髓损伤（SCI）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Hospital-acquired-Pressure-ulcers-may-hinder-neurological-recovery-in-spinal-cord-injury-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Hospital-acquired-Pressure-ulcers-may-hinder-neurological-recovery-in-spinal-cord-injury-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c99aba34-e4be-45b5-bc74-e2f3c73833e8 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 09:45:07 -0500 Hospital-acquired pressure ulcers may hinder neurological recovery in spinal cord injury patients
新发现揭示了运动如何促进肌肉能量产生虽然众所周知，体育锻炼对我们有益，但许多潜在的分子机制仍有待确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-discovery-reveals-how-exercise-boosts-muscle-energy-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-discovery-reveals-how-exercise-boosts-muscle-energy-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4eb7e3ad-b49e-4701-9b92-9d87c6456f86 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 09:40:14 -0500 New discovery reveals how exercise boosts muscle energy production
研究人员揭示了理解大脑活动的突破性方法一种绘制大脑不同区域之间活动和连接的新方法揭示了对语言、思维和注意力等高阶功能如何组织的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Researchers-unveil-groundwriting-approach-to-understanding-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Researchers-unveil-groundwriting-approach-to-understanding-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23488394-036b-488d-891c-cad5daef602a Mon, 09 Dec 2024 09:32:01 -0500 Researchers unveil groundbreaking approach to understanding brain activity
新的脑刺激试验旨在改善 TBI 后的认知恢复辛辛那提大学的 Ishita Basu 表示，创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 是美国年轻人死亡和残疾的主要原因，也是现代战争中最具破坏性的幸存者伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-brain-stimulation-trial-aims-to-improve-cognitive-recovery-from-TBI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-brain-stimulation-trial-aims-to-improve-cognitive-recovery-from-TBI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a188ee98-1906-4615-b425-8bb772097fc3 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 08:58:21 -0500 New brain stimulation trial aims to improve cognitive recovery from TBI
突破性治疗提高了 B-ALL 儿童的生存率就在他四岁生日的前几天，圣地亚哥被诊断出患有 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (B-ALL)，这是儿童中最常见的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Breakthrough-treatment-improves-survival-rates-for-children-with-B-ALL.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Breakthrough-treatment-improves-survival-rates-for-children-with-B-ALL.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6a2f5f2-9704-4e33-9891-bec5dcc57e48 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 08:53:48 -0500 Breakthrough treatment improves survival rates for children with B-ALL
巴西的开创性研究发现与胰腺癌的新遗传联系胰腺癌最近已被列入巴西国家癌症研究所（INCA）定期发布统计数据的疾病清单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Pioneering-study-discovers-new-genic-links-to-pancreatic-cancer-in-Brazil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Pioneering-study-discovers-new-genic-links-to-pancreatic-cancer-in-Brazil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1676e020-b152-4000-9ef3-2f2bee7c9898 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 08:09:56 -0500 Pioneering study discovers new genetic links to pancreatic cancer in Brazil
